title: Phil's Fonts Top 25 From 2006
content:
The numbers are in. Here's the 25 most popular fonts from 2006. Of course results may vary from other distributors, foundries.

[http://www.philsfonts.com/top25.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014095053/http:/www.philsfonts.com/top25.html "http://www.philsfonts.com/top25.html")

RS
author: RS

comments.content: I have not followed the most popular fonts in the past and am curious if the preponderance of sans serif is typical.
Yes, it is. You can see that on the Font Charts at FontShop, fonts.com, and Linotype. At MyFonts, the top fonts include a lot of display script faces as well.

[FAQ Best Selling Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014095053/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FAQ%20Best%20Selling%20Fonts)

Sans and Scripts are the vogue of the past several years.
